name: mdtutor
description: Markdown-based learning platform for Makerspace tutorials

scripts.test:frontend: npm run test:unit --workspace=@mdtutor/web && npm run test:e2e
scripts.dev: node tools/kill-ports.js && dotenv -- concurrently -k -n api,web,achiev,sso -c blue,green,magenta,yellow "npm run api" "npm run web" "npm run achievements" "npm run sso"
scripts.dev:test: node tools/kill-ports.js && RAILS_ENV=test dotenv -- concurrently -k -n api,web,achiev,sso -c blue,green,magenta,yellow "npm run api" "npm run web" "npm run achievements" "npm run sso"
scripts.dev:bg: dotenv -- concurrently -k -n api,web,achiev,sso -c blue,green,magenta,yellow "npm run api" "npm run web" "npm run achievements" "npm run sso"
